data.title: Eight things you may or may not know about me

summary.content: Eight things you may or may not know about me. (This list was inspired by my friend Liz who also wrote such a list.) My Love Language (from The Book “the 5 Love Languages”) Is “Words of Affirmation”. I’m The Biggest “calvin And Hobbes” Fan On The Face Of The Entire Planet. Between My First Girlfriend At 15 And My Marriage At 21 I’d Dated 12.1 People. I’m Not Easily Impressed, And I’m Frequently Bored/depressed/feel Alone.

content.html:
Eight things you may or may not know about me. (This list was inspired by my friend Liz who also wrote such a list.)

  1. My Love Language (from The Book “the 5 Love Languages”) Is “Words of Affirmation”.

  2. I’m The Biggest “calvin And Hobbes” Fan On The Face Of The Entire Planet.

  3. Between My First Girlfriend At 15 And My Marriage At 21 I’d Dated 12.1 People.

  4. I’m Not Easily Impressed, And I’m Frequently Bored/depressed/feel Alone.

  5. Nothing Good Ever Happens After 2:00 am.

  6. I Have A Technically-inclined INFJ (introverted, Intuiting, Feeling, Judging) Personality Type. I’m Also A Textbook Scorpio.

  7. My Most Significant Ex-girlfriend’s Birthday, My Wife’s Birthday, And My Anniversary Are All On The Same Date.

  8. I’m Pretty Well-balanced Between The Creative And The Technical.
content.plain:
Eight things you may or may not know about me. (This list was inspired by my friend Liz who also wrote such a list.)
  My Love Language (from The Book “the 5 Love Languages”) Is “Words of Affirmation”.
  I’m The Biggest “calvin And Hobbes” Fan On The Face Of The Entire Planet.
  Between My First Girlfriend At 15 And My Marriage At 21 I’d Dated 12.1 People.
  I’m Not Easily Impressed, And I’m Frequently Bored/depressed/feel Alone.
  Nothing Good Ever Happens After 2:00 am.
  I Have A Technically-inclined INFJ (introverted, Intuiting, Feeling, Judging) Personality Type. I’m Also A Textbook Scorpio.
  My Most Significant Ex-girlfriend’s Birthday, My Wife’s Birthday, And My Anniversary Are All On The Same Date.
  I’m Pretty Well-balanced Between The Creative And The Technical.
content.source:
Eight things you may or may not know about me. (This list was inspired by my friend Liz who also wrote such a list.)

1. My Love Language (from The Book “the 5 Love Languages”) Is “Words of Affirmation”.

2. I’m The Biggest “calvin And Hobbes” Fan On The Face Of The Entire Planet.

3. Between My First Girlfriend At 15 And My Marriage At 21 I’d Dated 12.1 People.

4. I’m Not Easily Impressed, And I’m Frequently Bored/depressed/feel Alone.

5. Nothing Good Ever Happens After 2:00 am.

6. I Have A Technically-inclined INFJ (introverted, Intuiting, Feeling, Judging) Personality Type. I’m Also A Textbook Scorpio.

7. My Most Significant Ex-girlfriend’s Birthday, My Wife’s Birthday, And My Anniversary Are All On The Same Date.

8. I’m Pretty Well-balanced Between The Creative And The Technical.
